body:
I Have thought About it for a while..... Should i retire Or not?
And how long should i? i have loads of school work and stuff but..... should i really retire or not?
I Would prob retire for about.... 3 months or 1 or 2 years ...but yeah....
Signing Out.

replies.body: I suggest you put your school work first. School is waaaay more important than internet and Minecraft, I mean where is Minecraft going to get you in life? :P If you are going to leave, good luck with life! Don't let anyone hold you back :)
